physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features two ladies. Both of them are looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. They have their arms around one another. They are standing on a carpeted floor. The background of the photograph shows the interior of a house. Chairs, table, and a wall clock can be seen.
sgcool_label_text: This photograph shows Alice and Agnes Tan, daughters of prominent Malayan Peranakan politician and businessman  Tun Dato' Sir Tan Cheng Lock, posing inside a house.
title_text: Photograph of Alice and Agnes Tan
subject_terms_1: double portraits women (female humans) Peranakan folk costume
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Women Peranakan (Asian people) Ethnic costume
